articles.author: Josh Lawless
articles.title: Lionel Messi Has Been Told He 'Will Never Be Diego Maradona' Despite Argentina's Copa America Triumph - SPORTbible
articles.description: Lionel Messi finally won an international trophy but it's not enough for him to to be on Diego Maradona's level according to some.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi's recent Copa America triumph does not put him on par with Diego Maradona according to Argentina legend Mario Kempes.
After three disappointing defeats in the final of the Copa America,… [+2394 chars]

articles.title: ESA and NASA partner in Earth science to respond to climate change - SpaceWatch.Global
articles.description: Luxembourg, 15 July 2021. – The European and the American space agencies, ESA and NASA, formed a strategic partnership to further Earth science and combat climate change. The aim of the partnership is
articles.content:

articles.author: Ariel Edwards-Levy, CNN
articles.title: A new poll shows why some vaccine-hesitant Americans decided to get the Covid-19 shot - CNN
articles.description: Roughly one-fifth of Americans were initially hesitant about or squarely against getting the Covid-19 vaccine but have since gotten their shots, according to polling released Tuesday by the Kaiser Family Foundation.
